name: SWAMP SIM RELAYERED
description:
Shrek is back and more layered than ever before.

Release your inner brogre within and enter Shrek's swamp, if you dare.

This remake was made by:

-Omogonix (Lachlan Shelton)

-Kirley Games (Kyle Kirley)

-SalihGameplay (Salih Ikiz)

This game is a remake of Swamp Sim by Arman Karshenas on GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/swamp-sim-horror/20797

There are three endings in this remake:

Ending #1: Beat game normally. Ending #2: Beat game on Ogredrive. Ending #3: Find the hidden golden onion after beating Ogredrive and collecting 7 of the 8 layers.

"Shrek is love. Shrek is life." -God, 2013
